com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.shapeeffect

Class SpenFillPatternEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.shapeeffect.SpenFillEffectBase
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.shapeeffect.SpenFillPatternEffect

  • public class SpenFillPatternEffect
extends SpenFillEffectBase
    SpenFillPatternEffect class. This class manages pattern effects which fill shapes.
    Since:
    4.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • setPattern

        public void setPattern(char[] pattern)
        Set the pattern to fill. Pattern is 8x8 bitmap information.
        Parameters:
        pattern - The pattern to fill. The pattern should consist of 8 bits * 8 lines. Each bit of this pattern represents a pixel.
        [1] means foreground color, [0] means background color.

        e.g '0x88' equivalent to 10001000, '0x44' equivalent to 01000100

        char pattern[] = { 0xc0, 0xc0, 0x30, 0x30, 0x0c, 0x0c, 0x03, 0x03 }; will make the bitmap pattern below.

        11000000
        11000000
        00110000
        00110000
        00001100
        00001100
        00000011
        00000011
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if pattern is not valid.
        NullPointerException - If the pattern is null.
        See Also:
        getPattern()

      • getPattern

        public char[] getPattern()
        Get the pattern to fill.
        Returns:
        Pattern to fill.
        See Also:
        setPattern(char[])
